item.title: Terms of Service
item.description: Terms of Service Terms of Service and User Agreement Terms of Service 1. Acceptance of Terms The following “Terms of Service” governs your use of the software and services provided by The Church Member’s Journey (the “Site”). This is a binding agreement between you and The Church Member’s Journey and incorporates our Privacy Policy at https://www.thechurchmembersjourney.com/privacy-policy. By using any software or services provided by The Church Member’s Journey (the “Services”), you are accepting to be bound to the terms of this Agreement.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy The Church Member’s Journey recognizes that your privacy is important. This Policy discloses the privacy practices for The Church Member’s Journey website (the “Site”), as well as related products and services we may offer to you (the “Service”). This Policy also covers how personal and other information that we receive or collect about you and your clients (“Clients”) is treated. Please read the information below to learn the following regarding your use of this Site.

item.title: About
item.description: About Us Bryce grew up in a ministry home in New Jersey, where he could see the impact of the gospel first-hand. He was significantly impacted by his youth pastor throughout his teenage years, which ignited a passion for seeing others grow in their walk with the Lord. Bryce graduated from college in 2011 with a Bible degree. Upon graduation, he returned to New Jersey, where he taught in a Christian School as a Bible and history teacher from 2011-2015.
